A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I almost walked out of this movie 4 times. Not because I'm a die hard Star Wars authentist\, but because it was cheesy\, confusing\, poorly written etc. I stayed because I paid D-Box prices and I hoped it would get better. It didn't and my 13 year old and I spent most of the movie rolling our eyes and laughing out loud at the absurd directions the story took. Now the only Star Wars I'll be watching are episodes 4-7. I don't know how Disney can right this wrong.
